adrFormatAddress: 403 W 48th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: Working at Inspired Marketing was one of the best experiences I’ve had. Not only have I met some of the greatest people who have helped me grow both professionally and personally but the work atmosphere and attitude of the place was something that motivated me and made me happy to come to work everyday. Sharon is the hardest working person I know, working with her was what made me love the job. She genuinely cares for all her employees and does whatever she can to help them succeed. My time at Inspired Marketing taught me so much and I know I’ll always have a family there.

text.text: Working at Inspired Marketing was one of the best experiences I’ve had. originalText.text: Inspired Marketing has helped my personal growth; better communication, marketing and management skills. I worked along with Sharon for a few months and it was a a great experience I’ll never forget. This company offers a friendly/working environment, and her teachings allowed everyone to learn so much. Sharon and the others I have worked with are amazing, genuine, fun, outgoing, hardworking and helpful people. You will always have someone there to help guide you through those tough times, and boost your confidence and make sure you can handle things so that you can help teach others. I highly recommend this place if you are need for an employment opportunity.

originalText.text: I worked along with Sharon when she first started Inspired back in 2013. She is the type of person that is committed to the people she works with. She cares about the growth of individuals and is someone you want to use as a referral if you choose to go down an other career path. I worked with Sharon for months and noticed that she genuinely cared and does not forget people that invest their time to learn from her. She wants to leave people better off for knowing her. Sharon and the people she works with are genuinely honest, outgoing and hardworking. Sales is not the easiest position to master but she works along side her team to achieve the goals of the individuals that make that team. I am glad I had the chance to meet her and learn from her and know that people entering the sales position are lucky to get chance to as well.

originalText.text: Working at Inspired Marketing was one of the most fulfilling work experiences in my professional life. Once you arrive, you are surrounded by such a positive and uplifting atmosphere. Sharon is such a kind and helpful leader and brings out the best in all of us. Excellent and Professional, 5 stars all the way!

Sharon is such a kind and helpful leader and brings out the best in all of us. Excellent and Professional, 5 stars all the way!

originalText.text: Inspired is a great place to work,atmosphere is friendly, unlike other marketing firms that I worked at where it was a lot of pressure on everyone. This place is very relaxed and Sharon is absolutely the best boss I've ever worked for. She is very genuine,and truly cares about all her employees and is always ready to help if needed.
